full_summary:
==============================

### Tender Notice Announcement

**Reference:** W3555-230843  
**Title:** Flight Deck Coating Repairs at HMCS Vancouver  
**Publication Date:** 13 February 2023  
**Closing Date:** 28 February 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time

**Background:**

The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence (DND) has announced a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for a contractor to carry out painting and preservation work on the flight deck of HMCS Vancouver. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, the application of coatings, inspection, testing, and trials. Please refer to the associated Technical Specifications, Statement of Work, and Project Management Services attached as annexes for further details.

**Eligibility and Requirements:**

* Interested contractors must have a valid Canadian Industrial Identification Number (CSIIN).
* Contractors must have experience and expertise in painting and preservation work.
* The contractor will be required to provide project management services and quality control throughout the duration of the project.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:
* Cost
* Quality
* Firm's ability to perform the contract
* Non-compliance with this procurement process

**Addenda and Amendments:**

There have been no addenda to this RFP. However, do refer to the Amendment Record schedule linked to the solicitation document for any changes that may have occurred.

**Contact Information:**

Jason Smith, SPAC/PSPC  
Email: [jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None  

### Attachment:

This RFP and associated documents are available on the DISCOVERY PUBLIC TENDERS website at the provided link. All correspondence regarding this RFP will be conducted via email. It is the responsibility of the contractor to ensure that this link and the relevant documentation are accessed by their technical team.

_**Please Note: This solicitation has been cancelled.**_
